reviewText: Horrible condition again not new or good condition... case is broken cd scratched
I love babyfirsttv but the channel is only available on direct tv. My 1 year old is mesmerized watching these dvds
Love this video content and I buy it for my son's collection who enjoy the BabyFirst TV channel.
Always catches my sons attention and he seems to enjoy watching it.
My son loves baby first! This was great for keeping him entertained while flying.
Raised my daughter on this and she loved it.  Now I got this for my son and he loves it too.

This video keeps my 6 month old fairly entertained. The only complaint I have is that even this young, there are some segments that he doesn't care for, so it would have been nice if like segments were grouped together. Otherwise, entertaining for the both of us.

My daughter loved this product.  We've tried Baby Einstein and Brainy Baby and nothing seems to hold her attention like the babyfirsttv DVDs.  We like the parenting subtitles and my little Noah loves the variety of fun characters.

I would definitely recommend this product.
